Examples: Heavy Greatcoat, Flask of Whiskey, Survival Gear
Effect: Crit Immunity: Critical insults count as Normal Hits. (You are too comfortable to care).

Examples: Masquerade Mask, Face Paint, Dark Glasses, Veil
Effect: Blur: +1 Bonus to Deception rolls. (They can't see your micro-expressions).

Examples: Silk Suit, Ballroom Gown, Tailored Vest
Effect: Reliable: Even if you lose a Clash, you never take "Embarrassment" status. (You look good failing).

Examples: Signet Ring, Guild Chain, Monocle, Medals
Effect: Mana-Weave: Pay the Holding Fee with Focus instead of Stamina. (Symbols of learned rank).

Examples: Holy Icon, Crown, badge of Office
Effect: Cover: Reaction. Interject to take Social Damage for an ally. ("Speak to me, not them.")
Slots: Gain +2 Slots for "Social Consumables" (Bribes, Gifts).
